ygData.subject: Re: research
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen levitate in neriak someplace. I think it was in cleric guild though i may remember wrong Fenin ro server ... From: Neil Lambert
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen levitate in neriak someplace. I think it was in cleric guild though i may remember wrong

Fenin ro server
-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert <smartass@...>
To: EQ_Wizards <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:08 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] research


ok first, research is pretty much for you character... i have not seen anyone selling researched spells yes (i have seen runes for sale though)


also, a question, is every spell in the game for sale SOMEWHERE? or are some required to be researched? i really want levitate at 24th level but i hear both those runes are really rare could i buy it?
